select ad_schedule_id, schedule_name, release_days, release_type,
CASE release_type WHEN '0' THEN '全部' WHEN '1' THEN '按地区' WHEN '2' THEN '按场所' ELSE '' END releaseTypeName, release_position,
(SELECT DISTINCT sdd.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data sdd WHERE sdd.dict_type ='release_position' AND sdd.dict_value=zas.`release_position` ) releasePositionName, sx_schedule_id, pid,tid,theme_template_id, status, (SELECT DISTINCT sdd.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data sdd WHERE sdd.dict_type ='schedule_status' AND sdd.dict_value=zas.`status` ) statusName, total_pay, prepay, release_term_num,promotioner, (select distinct u.user_name from sys_user u where u.user_id =zas.`promotioner` ) promotionerName, releaser, (select distinct u.user_name from sys_user u where u.user_id =zas.`releaser` ) releaserName, approved, CASE approved WHEN '1' THEN '审核通过' WHEN '0' THEN '审核不通过' ELSE '待审核' END approvedName, approved_remark,approved_user, is_del, release_note, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, advertiser, (SELECT DISTINCT za.advertisor_name FROM zx_advertise za WHERE za.advertise_id =zas.`advertiser`) advertiseName, (select material_text from zx_ad_material zam where zam.ad_schedule_id=zas.ad_schedule_id and ext_material_type='3' limit 1) materialText, total_time,pay_status,qr_url,dead_line,ext_schedule_id from zx_ad_schedule zas

SELECT DISTINCT zas.ad_schedule_id, zas.schedule_name, zas.release_days, zas.release_type, CASE zas.release_type WHEN '0' THEN '全部' WHEN '1' THEN '按地区' WHEN '2' THEN '按场所' ELSE '' END releaseTypeName, zas.release_position,
(SELECT DISTINCT sdd.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data sdd WHERE sdd.dict_type ='release_position' AND sdd.dict_value=zas.`release_position` ) releasePositionName, zas.sx_schedule_id, zas.pid,zas.tid,zas.theme_template_id, zas.status, (SELECT DISTINCT sdd.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data sdd WHERE sdd.dict_type ='schedule_status' AND sdd.dict_value=zas.`status` ) statusName, zas.total_pay, zas.prepay, zas.release_term_num,zas.promotioner, (select distinct u.user_name from sys_user u where u.user_id =zas.`promotioner` ) promotionerName, zas.releaser, (select distinct u.user_name from sys_user u where u.user_id =zas.`releaser` ) releaserName, zas.approved, CASE zas.approved WHEN '1' THEN '审核通过' WHEN '0' THEN '审核不通过' ELSE '待审核' END approvedName, zas.approved_remark,zas.approved_user, zas.is_del, zas.release_note, zas.create_by, zas.create_time, zas.update_by, zas.update_time, zas.advertiser, (SELECT DISTINCT za.advertisor_name FROM zx_advertise za WHERE za.advertise_id =zas.`advertiser`) advertiseName, total_time,pay_status,zas.release_status,zas.qr_url,zas.dead_line,zas.ext_schedule_id FROM zx_ad_schedule zas LEFT JOIN zx_ad_release_record a ON a.schedule_id = zas.ad_schedule_id LEFT JOIN zx_device b ON a.device_id=b.device_id
mapper.select: where exists(select 1 from zx_ad_release_timer zarr where zarr.ad_schedule_id=zas.ad_schedule_id and zarr.release_begin_time <= now() and zarr.release_end_time >= now()) and release_status='0'
where not exists(select 1 from zx_ad_release_timer zarr where zarr.ad_schedule_id=zas.ad_schedule_id and zarr.release_begin_time <= now() and zarr.release_end_time >= now()) and release_status='1'
